You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxv;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxV;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2551/index.htm U+02551].
  * `&boxv;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2502/index.htm U+02502].
